snippet: As a late entrant into the city comptroller’s race, the former governor is unable to take the slow and steady approach.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on Eliot Spitzer's late entry into race for city comptroller; which has hampered his usual slow and steady campaign approach; holds one result of such chaos is that he cannot be bothered to square his past ideals about campaign finances with his current plans.
lead_paragraph: As a late entrant into the city comptroller’s race, the former governor is unable to take the slow and steady approach.

headline.print_headline: Spitzer, in a Frenzy, Shows an Inconsistency on Campaign Financing
headline.main: Spitzer, in a Frenzy, Shows an Inconsistency on Campaign Financing
